hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Eye Statue Wonderitem

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Don't forget to write down your hints :)

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Stone of Agony# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #a Small Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Fourth Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #generic grotto#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #4# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #1# major item.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the fastest way forward is walking backwards.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Deku Shield#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple Boss Key# can be found in #the Market#.
